SEARCH
Module org.postgresql.pljava
Package org.postgresql.pljava

Interface PLJavaBasedLanguage

All Known Subinterfaces:
PLJavaBasedLanguage.InlineBlocks, PLJavaBasedLanguage.ReturningSets, PLJavaBasedLanguage.Routines, PLJavaBasedLanguage.Triggers, PLJavaBasedLanguage.UsingTransforms
public interface PLJavaBasedLanguage
Interface for a procedural language on PL/Java infrastructure.

An implementing class does not implement this interface directly, but rather implements one or both of the subinterfaces InlineBlocks and Routines. A language that implements Routines may also implement one or more of: Triggers, UsingTransforms. The implementing class must have a public constructor with a ProceduralLanguage parameter, which it may ignore, or use to determine the name, oid, accessibility, or other details of the declared PostgreSQL language the handler class has been instantiated for.

    PLJavaBasedLanguage.Routine
    The result of a specialize call on a Template.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.Routines
    To be implemented by a language that supports routines (that is, functions and/or procedures).
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.SRFFirst
    The result of a specializeValuePerCall call on an SRFTemplate.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.SRFNext
    The result of a firstCall call on an instance of SRFFirst.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.SRFTemplate
    Superinterface for the result of a prepareSRF call on a PL/Java-based set-returning function.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.Template
    The result of a prepare call on a PL/Java-based routine.

    The result of a specialize call on a TriggerTemplate.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.Triggers
    To be implemented by a language that supports triggers.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.TriggerTemplate
    The result of a prepareTrigger call on a PL/Java-based trigger function.
    static interface 
    PLJavaBasedLanguage.UsingTransforms
    To be implemented by a language that supports routines declared with TRANSFORM FOR TYPE.
